name: Sky Fire
description:
Lame game for Lame Jam 26!

Setting

Humanity colonized some other planet! The only source of energy is solar! The main problem is the pesky clouds that keep on blocking the planet's star! To battle this problem the humans put a space station in the skies, gave it a big laser, put AI (you) in charge and told it to shoot at clouds that are interrupting the human colony's expansion!

Gameplay

WASD to move the camera.

Left click on clouds to shoot your laser at them!

Goal and tips

Protect the solar generators from the clouds!

The longer the generator stays active (not blocked by any clouds) the more energy (points) it generates!

If a generator get blocked all of its child generators stop working as well.

Big numbers good, post your highscores in the comments!

Development team

  • Daatster#7749 - that's me!

This game is a submission for Lam Jam 26
